location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Captain C F Grice, commanding the Honourable Company's Cruiser (HCC) Elphinstone

mods.abstract: Stannus gives Grice the instructions he is to follow while his ship is stationed on the pearl banks, covering general policy toward fishing vessels, piracy, and the course his ship should take.
